dcterms:description: A dataset containing turmeric powder samples adulterated with varying levels of rice flour, used to validate the imaging system's performance.
dcterms:title: Turmeric Powder Samples (for adulteration levels)

dcterms:description: A dataset containing coconut oil samples adulterated with varying levels of palm oil, used to assess the performance of the imaging system.
dcterms:title: Coconut Oil Samples (for adulteration levels)
